name: tm10
effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Hidden Power to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Double-Edge)

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: The attack power varies among different POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that varies in type and intensity depending on the user.
